name: Cladmen
description:
Cladmen is an adventure game with RPG elements.The main character learns about the unpleasant diagnosis of his mother.To save her, you need to earn a lot of money.In a normal job, this is almost impossible to do, so you have to connect your life with crime.Learn how to cook substances, and then place them around the city.To earn as much money as possible and pay for the operation, but remember that one wrong step and it can end badly for you.

What awaits you in the game?
- Open world
- Preparation of substances
- Escapes from the police
- Develop your business to a new level
- Multiple endings
- Cute graphics
